title.narrative: Recuperacion de la concha como fuente de seguridad alimentaria de familias recolectoras en 3 paises de la costa pacifica

description.narrative: Las costas pacficas de Colombia, Perú y Ecuador son una importante fuente de recursos marinos costeros, para las poblaciones humanas que residen all. La pesca y recolección son actividades económicas y de subsistencia de las familias que all habitan. Una actividad económica importante es la recolección de conchas, realizada principalmente por mujeres y nios/as pequeos de las poblaciones costeras del norte de Ecuador y sur de Colombia. La propuesta apunta a fortalecer redes de organizaciones

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
